alert.note: Alert for Pecos; Reeves County Plains; Ward (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 11:20PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN PECOS...EAST CENTRAL REEVES AND SOUTHEASTERN WARD COUNTIES THROUGH 1145 PM CDT... At 1119 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles south of Pyote, or 21 miles east of Pecos, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Coyanosa and B F Goodrich Testing Track. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
